RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 16. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 ( Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHELL FIRE unhurried outside, rallied three wide through the far turn to make the lead in upper stretch and drew clear late under brisk handling. DEBDURITE pressed the pace along the inside for a half, made the lead, set the pace to the top of the stretch then was no match for the winner. ROSAS WAY trailed until mid stretch, swung wide and got up for third in the middle of the racetrack. IT'S FATE settled in the three path for a half, shifted out to the four path, checked between horses entering the far turn, improved in the five path in upper stretch then failed to sustain that bid. ALGORIX stalked the pace in the four then three paths into the far turn then weakened. SKIDSTREAM set a pressured pace two wide for just over a half, had speed into the stretch then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Shell Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried outside, rallied 3 wide 2nd turn, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Rosas Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, up third mid track

ENTRY.NAME: It's Fate
ENTRY.OWNER: Agostini Arthur O and Lilius Henrik
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 3path, shifted 4path 1/2pole, checked between horses 3/8

ENTRY.NAME: Debdurite
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, led, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Skidstream
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2 wide 1/2, speed lane, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Algorix
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4-3paths 2nd turn, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 15. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. ARace Sin ce June 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIVA POWER away alertly, opened a daylight lead soon after the start, set all the pace unchallenged and won as much the best under mild left handed urging in the four path. BOOGIE BOOGEE chased the winner and finished clear for second in the four path. BOSSY LADY stalked the pace outside rivals and went evenly. PERFECTINGTHEVIEW failed to menace. CITY SIGNS stalked the pace along the inside through the turn then faded. LARSA trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Perfectingtheview
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Larsa
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, unchallenged, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: City Signs
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Boogie Boogee
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, clear second 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Bossy Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, evenly outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 16. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASCABRIA prompted the pace two wide into the stretch, dug in late under right handed urging and just got up by the narrowest of margins. CAROL'S ROYALTY broke in front, set all the pace under pressure along the inside and just missed hanging on. BLACK BUTTE never far back, finished with good courage three wide. MAMBO DANCER was a sharp threat into the stretch and faded late along the inside. LA MUNECA trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: La Muneca
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Mambo Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, faded late inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Black Butte
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Cascabria
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, long drive, just up

ENTRY.NAME: Carol's Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, inside, just failed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 31400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 16 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIT TO FLY sprinted to the lead leaving the chute, set all the pace while getting rapid fractions, widened into the stretch at will and won easily. SPEIGHTY WAR trailed down the backstretch five wide, rallied two wide through the stretch and finished second best. AGNELLO'S DREAM stalked the pace into the stretch, drifted out to the seven path under left handed urging and improved position late. AMERICAN PRINCE pressured the winner two wide down the backstretch, kept on until deep stretch then weakened while three wide. LUCKY NINETEEN close up, failed to respond. DOCTOR WU raced wide and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Fit to Fly
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead, set fast pace, drew off, easily,

ENTRY.NAME: Speighty War
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late rally, 2 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Doctor Wu
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Agnello's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, drifted 7path left handed urging, improved position lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Nineteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: American Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 93. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAISON KARTER prompted the pace two wide for five furlongs, made the lead, set the balance of the pace and finished full of run through deep stretch to win going away. BOURBON WISDOM with the second flight three wide, had a mild late rally two wide and finished second best. LAUDA SPEED vied for the lead outside rivals and finished with good courage. AULD LANGE SYNE set a pressured pace along the inside for five furlongs, had speed into the stretch and faded late. TOE TAPPIN LUKE moved up two wide before a half then weakened on the far turn. LEXATOGA trailed around the clubhouse turn, moved up along the rail before a half then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Auld Lange Syne
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, set pressured pace inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Raison Karter
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, perfect trip, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Wisdom
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, mild rally 2 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Lauda Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Lexatoga
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, rail, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Toe Tappin Luke
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 2 wide, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 86. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 27400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $20,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 16 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HENRY MAC broke in front, set all the pace while nicely rated and edged clear late under confident handling. SEND ME ON with the second flight two wide, had a mild late rally three wide and finished second best. VISUAL MISSION pressured the winner two wide until deep stretch and was outfinished. OAKEN pressed the pace two wide around the clubhouse turn, dropped back, stalked the pace until deep stretch then faded inside. RAVEN MOON trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Raven Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Henry Mac
ENTRY.OWNER: Samuel Klein Jr LLC and Enjoy The Ride Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, nicely rated, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Oaken
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Quezada Maria
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed first turn, dropped back, stalked pace, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Visual Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Send Me On
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, mild rally, 3 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 16600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 16 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Regis tered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAPPILEA away alertly, matched strides for the lead three wide into the stretch, gained the lead and wore down rivals in a game effort. WILE E PEYOTE trailed into the turn, shifted outside in upper stretch, rallied determinedly and got up for second. LAZARUS PROJECT never far back, finished with good courage three wide. BOURBON OVER ICE dueled for the lead two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. ROCK ON KITTEN settled four wide and went evenly. MONTAUK COVE battled for the lead along the rail into the turn, had speed into the stretch then faded. MORE THAN GOOD was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Montauk Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside turn, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lazarus Project
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Over Ice
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Wile E Peyote
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late rally, outside, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Rock On Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: More Than Good
ENTRY.OWNER: Poole Joseph M and McCall Richard H
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Happilea
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, dueled 3 wide, wore down rivals, right urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Purse 32500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 16 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowance s) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOHN'S ROCK unhurried early, closed rapidly through the far turn to make the lead at the top of the stretch, then drew off under right handed urging in the middle of the racetrack to win as much the best. COMPLY slow early, closed willingly along the inside through the stretch and finished clear for second. AZURE SKY trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals near mid track. NIGHT TIME RULER moved up widest before a half then weakened on the far turn. SO DIALED IN away alertly, set a rapid pace until the top of the stretch then was used up. DREAM KEEPER chased the pace into the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Night Time Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move outside, swung wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Azure Sky
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Dream Keeper
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: John's Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed fast mid track, drew off, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: So Dialed In
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set fast pace top lane, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Comply
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, closed willingly inside, clearly second best
